myths.myth_1: A vaccine to cure COVID-19 is available.

myths.myth_2: You can protect yourself from COVID-19 by swallowing or gargling with bleach, taking acetic acid or steroids, or using essential oils, salt water, ethanol or other substances.

myths.myth_3: The new coronavirus was deliberately created or released by people.

myths.myth_4: Ordering or buying products shipped from China will make a person sick.

myths.myth_5: A face mask will protect you from COVID-19.

myths.myth_6: Spraying alcohol or chlorine all over your body kill the new coronavirus.

myths.myth_7: You can protect yourself from COVID-19 by injecting, swallowing, bathing in or rubbing onto your body bleach, disinfectants or rubbing alcohols.
